name: vsc-markdown
displayName: Elegant Markdown Editor for VS Code
description: Instant Markdown rendering and editing with WYSIWYG support.

commands.title: Palm Markdown | Convert to Title Case

vsc-markdown.statusBar.items.description: Order and visibility of status bar buttons (drag to reorder)
vsc-markdown.statusBar.items.markdownDescription: Configure which formatting buttons appear in the status bar and their order. Drag items to reorder.

vsc-markdown.webviewContextMenu.items.description: Order and visibility of webview context menu items (drag to reorder)
vsc-markdown.webviewContextMenu.items.markdownDescription: Configure which formatting options appear in the webview right-click menu and their order. Drag to reorder.

vsc-markdown.features.insertH1.keybindin.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert H1 Heading
vsc-markdown.features.insertH1.keybindin.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+alt+1** for Insert H1 Heading

vsc-markdown.features.insertH2.keybindin.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert H2 Heading
vsc-markdown.features.insertH2.keybindin.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+alt+2** for Insert H2 Heading

vsc-markdown.features.insertH3.keybindin.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert H3 Heading
vsc-markdown.features.insertH3.keybindin.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+alt+3** for Insert H3 Heading

vsc-markdown.features.insertH4.keybindin.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert H4 Heading
vsc-markdown.features.insertH4.keybindin.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+alt+4** for Insert H4 Heading

vsc-markdown.features.insertH5.keybindin.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert H5 Heading
vsc-markdown.features.insertH5.keybindin.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+alt+5** for Insert H5 Heading

vsc-markdown.features.insertH6.keybindin.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert H6 Heading

vsc-markdown.features.insertStrikethroug.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert Strikethrough

vsc-markdown.features.insertCode.keybind.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert Inline Code
vsc-markdown.features.insertCode.keybind.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+grave** for Insert Inline Code

vsc-markdown.features.insertList.keybind.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert Unordered List
vsc-markdown.features.insertList.keybind.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+l** for Insert Unordered List

vsc-markdown.features.insertOrderedList..description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert Ordered List
vsc-markdown.features.insertOrderedList..markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+shift+l** for Insert Ordered List

vsc-markdown.features.insertTaskList.key.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert Task List
vsc-markdown.features.insertTaskList.key.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+j** for Insert Task List

vsc-markdown.features.toggleTaskCheck.ke.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Toggle Task Check
vsc-markdown.features.toggleTaskCheck.ke.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+shift+j** for Toggle Task Check

vsc-markdown.features.indentList.keybind.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Indent List
vsc-markdown.features.indentList.keybind.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **tab** for Indent List

vsc-markdown.features.unindentList.keybi.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Unindent List
vsc-markdown.features.unindentList.keybi.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **shift+tab** for Unindent List

vsc-markdown.features.insertLink.keybind.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert Link
vsc-markdown.features.insertLink.keybind.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+k** for Insert Link

vsc-markdown.features.toggleLinkInput.ke.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Toggle Link Input
vsc-markdown.features.toggleLinkInput.ke.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **alt+enter** for Toggle Link Input

vsc-markdown.features.insertCodeBlock.ke.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert Code Block
vsc-markdown.features.insertCodeBlock.ke.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+u** for Insert Code Block

vsc-markdown.features.insertTable.keybin.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Insert Table

vsc-markdown.features.switchEditor.keybi.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Switch Editor

vsc-markdown.features.openPreview.keybin.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Open Preview
vsc-markdown.features.openPreview.keybin.markdownDescription: Enable the keyboard shortcut **ctrl+shift+v** for Open Preview

vsc-markdown.features.formatDocument.key.description: Enable keyboard shortcut for: Format Document
